name: BeaconTransportP2PMatrix
summary: Beacon is an implementation of the wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconTransportP2PMatrix provides a P2P implementation which uses Matrix network for the communication.
description: Beacon is an implementation of the Tezos wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconTransportP2PMatrix provides a P2P implementation which uses Matrix network for the communication."
